description: Runs an LLM on each row of a DataFrame column. If no column is specified, all columns are used.

model.info: Connect the 'Language Model' output from your LLM component here.

system_message.info: Multi-line system instruction for all rows in the DataFrame.

df.info: The DataFrame whose column (specified by 'column_name') we'll treat as text messages.

column_name.info: The name of the DataFrame column to treat as text messages. If empty, all columns will be formatted in TOML.

output_column_name.info: Name of the column where the model's response will be stored.

enable_metadata.info: If True, add metadata to the output DataFrame.

batch_results.info: A DataFrame with all original columns plus the model's response column.

success.batch_completed: Batch processing completed successfully. Processed {total} rows.

info.processing_all_columns: Processing all columns as TOML format with {count} rows

errors.column_not_found: Column '{column}' not found in the DataFrame. Available columns: {available}
errors.toml_formatting_failed: Failed to format row as TOML: {error}
